head.title: Sitemap File
head.script: var selectedColor="blue",defaultColor="black",hdrRows=1,numeric="..",desc="..",html="..",freq="..";function initXsl(o,r){hdrRows=1,"sitemap"==r?(numeric=".3.",desc=".1.",html=".0.",freq=".2.",initTable(o),setSort(o,3,1)):(desc=".1.",html=".0.",initTable(o),setSort(o,1,1)),document.getElementById("head1").innerHTML+=" "+location,document.title+=": "+location}function initTable(o){var e=document.getElementById(o);for(r=0;r<hdrRows;r++)for(c=0;c<e.rows[r].cells.length;c++)r+e.rows[r].cells[c].rowSpan>hdrRows&&(hdrRows=r+e.rows[r].cells[c].rowSpan);for(r=0;r<hdrRows;r++)for(colNum=0,c=0;c<e.rows[r].cells.length;c++,colNum++)if(e.rows[r].cells[c].colSpan<2){if(theCell=e.rows[r].cells[c],rTitle=theCell.innerHTML.replace(/<[^>]+>| /g,""),rTitle>""){theCell.title="Change sort order for "+rTitle,theCell.onmouseover=function(){setCursor(this,"selected")},theCell.onmouseout=function(){setCursor(this,"default")};var l=15;numeric.indexOf("."+colNum+".")>-1&&(l-=1),desc.indexOf("."+colNum+".")>-1&&(l-=2),html.indexOf("."+colNum+".")>-1&&(l-=4),freq.indexOf("."+colNum+".")>-1&&(l-=8),theCell.onclick=new Function("sortTable(this,"+(colNum+r)+","+hdrRows+","+l+")")}}else colNum=colNum+e.rows[r].cells[c].colSpan-1}function setSort(o,r,e){var l=document.getElementById(o);l.rows[0].sCol=r,l.rows[0].sDir=e,l.rows[0].cells[r].className=e?"sortdown":"sortup"}function setCursor(o,r){rTitle=o.innerHTML.replace(/<[^>]+>| |\W/g,""),"selected"==r?(o.style.color!=selectedColor&&(defaultColor=o.style.color),o.style.color=selectedColor,o.style.cursor="pointer",window.status="Click to sort by '"+rTitle+"'"):(o.style.color=defaultColor,o.style.cursor="",window.status="")}function sortTable(o,e,l,s){var t=!(1&s);sDir=!(2&s);for(var c=!(4&s),n=!(8&s),a=o.parentNode;"TBODY"!=a.nodeName;)a=a.parentNode;var u=new Array;for(a.rows[0].sCol==e&&(sDir=!a.rows[0].sDir),a.rows[0].sCol>=0&&(a.rows[0].cells[a.rows[0].sCol].className=""),a.rows[0].sCol=e,a.rows[0].sDir=sDir,sDir?a.rows[0].cells[e].className="sortdown":a.rows[0].cells[e].className="sortup",i=0,r=l;r<a.rows.length;i++,r++){if(colCont=a.rows[r].cells[e].innerHTML,c&&(colCont=colCont.replace(/<[^>]+>/g,"")),t&&(colCont*=1,isNaN(colCont)&&(colCont=0)),n)switch(colCont.toLowerCase()){case"always":colCont=0;break;case"hourly":colCont=1;break;case"daily":colCont=2;break;case"weekly":colCont=3;break;case"monthly":colCont=4;break;case"yearly":colCont=5;break;case"never":colCont=6}u[i]=[r,a.rows[r],colCont]}for(u.sort(compRows),i=0,r=l;r<a.rows.length;i++,r++)a.insertBefore(u[i][1],a.rows[r]);window.status=""}function compRows(o,r){if(sDir){if(o[2]>r[2])return-1;if(o[2]<r[2])return 1}else{if(o[2]>r[2])return 1;if(o[2]<r[2])return-1}return 0}

body.h2: Number of URLs in this Sitemap:
